description: Variation of condition 50 (Approved Plans) to allow for Minor Material Amendments (Revisions to the design, external appearance, access and the internal layout of the three storey light industrial building in the south east of the site) to planning permission ref: P/2010/2539 dated 11/10/2010 as amended by permission ref: P/2012/2603 dated 09/08/2012 for construction of 20 x 3 storey houses in three terraces (a terrace of 6 x 4 bed dwellings fronting St Margaret's Road; a terrace 6 x 3 bed dwellings facing the Grand Union Canal, and a terrace of 8 x 4 bed dwellings parallel with Humes Avenue), a three storey building fronting St Margaret's Road containing 4 x 6 bed houses, and 4 flats (2 x 2 bed flats & 2 x 4 bed maisonettes), a 5 storey mansion block building backing onto Trumpers Way containing 45 flats (38 x 2 bed, 5 x 1 bed & 2 x 3 bed) (73 dwellings in total), all with access off St Margaret's Road and 80 residential car parking spaces including 38 at basement level, landscaping, amenity space and refuse storage. Construction of a 3 storey building containing 14 x B1 (light industrial/office) units with access off Trumpers way and 14 industrial/office car parking spaces. Provision of a pedestrian/cycle link between St Margaret's Road and the Grand Union Canal towpath to include approved plans planning condition to the approved consent
